CustomField.description: If this value is true, the Split Delivery, Address Change, and Shore Move components will wait for Delivery Address DSI Id to be returned via Informatica before successfully creating the address.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this value is true, the Split Delivery, Address Change, and Shore Move components will wait for Delivery Address DSI Id to be returned via Informatica before successfully creating the address.
CustomField.label: Validate DSI ID on New Delivery Address
